Title: Includes mentally disabled as among those veterans qualified to hold licenses granted under section 35-a of the general business law
Summary: Includes mentally disabled as among those veterans qualified to hold licenses granted under section 35-a of the general business law.
LawCode: Amd ยง35-a, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to veterans of the armed forces who vend in cities having a population of one million or more
